keyword: how many calories in miller lite
title: How Many Calories in Miller Lite?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in Miller Lite per 12 oz serving, including carbs, protein, sodium, and comparisons to other beers for your diet tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in Miller Lite?
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz (355 ml) can or bottle of Miller Lite light lager beer, unopened and chilled.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, serving size, and brand specifics; alcohol content affects calorie burn. Check labels or official sources for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz Miller Lite contains 96 calories with just 3.2 g carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Miller Lite?
How many carbs are in Miller Lite?
faqs.a: 3.2 g of carbohydrates per 12 oz serving, all from alcohol and minimal sugars.

faqs.q: Does Miller Lite have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Minimal 0.5 g protein and 0 g fat per serving.

faqs.q: How does Miller Lite compare calorie-wise to other light beers?
faqs.a: Similar to Bud Light (95 kcal) or Coors Light (102 kcal) per 12 oz.

faqs.q: Is Miller Lite low in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, only 10 mg sodium per 12 oz serving.
